translations: n．一瞥，短暂的看一眼：短暂的、快速的或不完整的观察或体验。
v．瞥见，短暂地看一眼：快速或不完整地看到或注意到某物。

sentences.sentence: When he talks, he only gives glimpses of his real self.
sentences.translation: 他讲话时只是偶尔流露出真实的自我。

sentences.sentence: We may have to give up some ability to show very limited glimpses of ourselves to others.
sentences.translation: 我们可能要放弃那些仅仅展示有限个人信息的能力。

sentences.sentence: Glimpses of soft feminine features evolve into men with handlebar mustaches and freckle-faced teenagers grinning through braces.
sentences.translation: 温柔的女性的脸孔可能在眨眼间变换成长着胡子的男性和长满雀斑、带着牙套咧嘴微笑的少年。
